name: London Racer: World Challenge
summary: London Racer: World Challenge is a racing game in which drivers race tracks all over the world. It is the eighth game in the A2 Racer series. This game, like the previous ones, is about racing through different cities, avoiding the police. The special thing is that it does not take place in the Netherlands. The cars that are driven are real car models but without a name. In total, the player can choose from 22 cars in this game.
